page.title: 12COLESWORTHY FARM LIVERTON
page.content: {Colesworthy Farm}is owned by{Mr J {Hendy.}His two sons and a student help him on the farm. The farm is a{Dairy {Farm.}The farm has 240 acres.Mr Hendy has 220 cattle.He has {104 fresian {cows, 60 fat cattle}and{50 calves.}50 acres are used for summer grazing,90 acres for silage,30 for barley and wheat and about 20 acres of conservation area. They have 4 tractors: 1{John Deere,}3{David Browns ,and a crop sprayer.In a year they use 60 tons of fertilizer.Mr Hendy has a bull which weighs over 1 ton.In the milking parlour the cows are milked twice a day at 5.30am and between 3.00 and 4.00pm.The cows do not give milk until they have had a calf.During the winter the cows are kept indoors all the time.There are{2 grain dryers,}1 of which is air tight and another 1 which isn't.
